name: Leléu e a Prisioneira
description:
Leléu e a Prisioneira is a 3D transmedia game in development. Based on the Brazilian movie "Lisbela e o Prisioneiro", the game takes place after the events of the movie and provides the player with an adventure between dimensions.

The game alternates between two characters with different gameplays, one full of action and platform and the other methodical and stealthy.

WORLD

Lisbela is trapped in the dimension of the movies, while Leléu is in the real world. Both need to collaborate, one in each dimension, to return to normal and save the Good Guy from the movies.
